AT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
AT.description: Ein Jahr nach den Ereignissen von Mega Man Zero wird unser Held überlistet und dazu gebracht, dem neuen Kommandanten von Neo Arcadia zu helfen, wodurch er erneut in einen Kampf zwischen Reploiden und Menschen verwickelt wird, in dem es gilt, die Welt zu retten. Schieße dir den Weg durch mehrere Level voller heißer Plattform-Action frei und setze dabei die neue Chain Rod ein, um dich an Vorsprüngen festzuhalten, Items einzusammeln oder Gegner anzugreifen. Weitere Neuerungen sind neu sind die sogenannten "Forms", Gestalten, die Zero annehmen kann, um noch mächtigere Fähigkeiten zu lernen – für einen gewissen Preis – sowie die EX Skills, die besonders geschickte Spieler mit Waffen von besiegten Bossgegnern belohnen.

AU.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
AU.description: One year after the events in Mega Man Zero, the hero gets tricked into helping Neo Arcadia's new commander; becoming caught between Reploids and humans in a new battle to save the world. Blast your way through multiple levels of intense platform-shooter action, using the new Chain Rod to grapple onto ledges, grab items or attack enemies. Also new to Mega Man Zero 2 are Forms – which grant Zero even more powerful abilities, but at a price – and EX Skills which reward the most skilled players with weapons from fallen bosses.

BG.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
BG.description: One year after the events in Mega Man Zero, the hero gets tricked into helping Neo Arcadia's new commander; becoming caught between Reploids and humans in a new battle to save the world. Blast your way through multiple levels of intense platform-shooter action, using the new Chain Rod to grapple onto ledges, grab items or attack enemies. Also new to Mega Man Zero 2 are Forms – which grant Zero even more powerful abilities, but at a price – and EX Skills which reward the most skilled players with weapons from fallen bosses.

BE.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
BE.description: Un an après les évènements de Mega Man Zero, le héros est forcé d'aider le nouveau commandant de Neo Arcadia et se retrouve coincé entre les Réploïdes et les humains dans une guerre pour sauver le monde. Entrez dans l'action dans cet intense jeu de tir et de plateforme, et parcourez les nombreux niveaux en utilisant votre Chain Rod comme grappin, ou pour attraper des objets ou attaquer des ennemis. Les nouveautés de Mega Man Zero 2 incluent les Formes, qui offrent à Zero de nouvelles capacités encore plus puissantes, mais à un certain prix, et les capacités EX, qui récompensent les joueurs les plus expérimentés avec les armes des boss qui ont été terrassés.

Schieße dir den Weg durch mehrere Level voller heißer Plattform-Action frei und setze dabei die neue Chain Rod ein, um dich an Vorsprüngen festzuhalten, Items einzusammeln oder Gegner anzugreifen. ES.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
ES.description: Un año después de lo acontecido en Mega Man Zero, nuestro héroe accede a ayudar al nuevo comandante de Neo Arcadia y se ve inmerso en la lucha que los humanos mantienen con los Reploids para salvar el mundo. Avanza por los numerosos niveles de este trepidante juego de plataformas y disparos usando el nuevo látigo de eslabones para aferrarte a las cornisas, coger objetos y atacar a tus enemigos. Además, Mega Man Zero 2 incluye otras dos novedades: las formas que Zero puede adoptar para obtener más poder a cambio de un precio y las habilidades EX, que permiten a los jugadores más avezados conseguir las armas de los jefes derrotados.

IT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
IT.description: Un anno dopo le imprese del primo capitolo di Mega Man Zero, il nostro eroe deve tornare in azione per salvare il mondo. Costretto ad aiutare il nuovo comandante della Neo Arcadia, si troverà nel mezzo di una nuova battaglia tra Reploid e umani. Fatti strada nei tantissimi livelli di questo sparatutto a piattaforme, ricorrendo a nuovi strumenti come la Chain Rod per aggrapparti, afferrare oggetti o attaccare i nemici. Inoltre, Mega Man Zero 2 è arricchito di nuove funzionalità: Zero può acquisire nuove "forme" che gli garantiscono potentissime abilità, sebbene a un prezzo; e grazie alle EX Skill i giocatori più abili possono ottenere le armi dei boss sconfitti.

NL.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
NL.description: De gebeurtenissen die plaatshadden in Mega Man Zero zijn een jaar oud. De held van toen wordt er door de nieuwe bevelhebber van Neo Arcadia ingeluisd. Hij bevindt zich wederom tussen de Reploids en de mensheid. Knal je een weg door verschillende levels bomvol intense klim- en klauteractie. Gebruik de nieuwe Chain Rod om je aan randen vast te klampen, voorwerpen op te pikken, en vijanden aan te vallen. Verder zijn er Forms die Zero tegen een prijs sterker maken, en EX Skills die gevorderde spelers belonen met wapens van verslagen eindbazen.

NZ.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
NZ.description: One year after the events in Mega Man Zero, the hero gets tricked into helping Neo Arcadia's new commander; becoming caught between Reploids and humans in a new battle to save the world. Blast your way through multiple levels of intense platform-shooter action, using the new Chain Rod to grapple onto ledges, grab items or attack enemies. Also new to Mega Man Zero 2 are Forms – which grant Zero even more powerful abilities, but at a price – and EX Skills which reward the most skilled players with weapons from fallen bosses.

PL.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
PL.description: One year after the events in Mega Man Zero, the hero gets tricked into helping Neo Arcadia's new commander; becoming caught between Reploids and humans in a new battle to save the world. Blast your way through multiple levels of intense platform-shooter action, using the new Chain Rod to grapple onto ledges, grab items or attack enemies. Also new to Mega Man Zero 2 are Forms – which grant Zero even more powerful abilities, but at a price – and EX Skills which reward the most skilled players with weapons from fallen bosses.

PT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
PT.description: Um ano após o sucedido em Mega Man Zero, o nosso herói é enganado e convencido a ajudar o novo comandante de Neo Arcadia, vendo-se novamente envolvido numa batalha entre Reploids e humanos para salvar o mundo. Abre caminho a disparar através de vários níveis de intensa ação de plataformas, utilizando a nova Chain Rod para te segurares com firmeza nas saliências, recolher itens ou atacar inimigos. Outra novidade em Mega Man Zero 2 são as novas habilidades que Zero pode adquirir: as chamadas "Forms", que concedem a Zero habilidades ainda mais poderosas (embora a um preço elevado) e as EX Skills, habilidades especiais atribuídas aos melhores jogadores com armas de bosses derrotados.

RU.name: Mega Man™ Zero 2
RU.description: Год спустя после событий Mega Man Zero, наш герой попадает в очередную переделку: в результате обмана он вынужден помогать новому главнокомандующему Neo Arcadia и присоединиться к битве за мир между реплоидами и людьми. Преодолевайте многочисленные уровни этого интенсивного платформера-шутера, используйте новое оружие Chain Rod (цепь-жезл), чтобы сражаться на каменных площадках, собирать предметы и атаковать врагов. Формы для ведения боя, еще одна новинка игры Mega Man Zero 2, наделяют Zero дополнительными возможностями (при соблюдении определенных условий) и EX навыками, которые позволяют наиболее опытным игрокам получать оружие побежденных боссов.
